summary: In Romania, Charley and his friends discover that their alluring art professor is a real-life vampire, hell-bent on completing an ancient ritual with Amy's blood. Are they all doomed to spend eternity as ravenous creatures of the night?

keywords: bathory|murder of a nude woman|female nudity|nudity|usa horror host
title: Noche de miedo 2: Sangre nueva
